name: Calculator - Smart Scratch Cat
description:
Calculator - Smart Scratch Cat

Just any normal calculator nothing weird or wrong with it. 

How To Play

You don't really play it but all you do is answer Smart Scratch Cats questions and you will get your answer.

Controls:

  • When Smart Scratch Cat asks you a question type in the box below your answer to the question.
  • When you push the right arrow key it changes the cursor color.

Program

The game was made in scratch - Scratch Link, Check it out it has a vast community with all kinds of games to play, see for yourself.
